main event: Several sightings of unidentified flying objects occurred over Tampa, Florida between September and November 1957.
interesting points: One sighting involved a bright, bell-shaped object that remained stationary before disappearing behind clouds., Another sighting featured a fast-moving object, half the size of the moon, that disappeared from view after shooting from SW to NE., Witnesses reported seeing multiple objects on radar traveling at high speeds during another observation., A bright ball of fire was described in one report, which ended with a loud explosion., Some sightings were concluded as possible meteor sightings or explained as likely aircraft.
sighted object: Various unidentified flying objects including a bright bell-shaped object, a fast-moving object, and multiple radar-detected crafts.
witness description: Civilians including teachers, students, housewives, and professionals.
